lead_paragraph: No arrests have been made in a series of collisions that occurred after midnight on Saturday in which pedestrians and a cyclist were hit by motorists.

byline.contributor: Sarah Maslin Nir and Eli Rosenberg contributed reporting.

snippet: No arrests have been made in a series of collisions that occurred after midnight on Saturday in which pedestrians and a cyclist were hit by motorists....
abstract: Five collisions between cars and pedestrians or cyclists, in which all five motorists flee scene, occur in New York City in one day, leaving three people dead and two injured; crashes occur even as number of fatal traffic collisions dropped for second year in row in 2015 under Mayor Bill de Blasio's Vision Zero plan to eliminate traffic deaths in city by 2024.

headline.main: 3 Killed and 2 Injured in Hit-and-Run Crashes Across New York City
headline.print_headline: 3 Killed and 2 Are Injured  in Hit-and-Run Crashes  Across New York City
